name: Police Brutality (Weasel Presents: Terrorists!)
description: My own little tribute to 80's action flicks, 90's lightgun games, and what Operation: Body Count really should have been. 8 (technically 11) brand new weapons with upgrade system, a whole set of new enemies (from William Shatner's TekWar - believe me, this mod is loads better than that game), and all sorts of other neat stuff.
